title: Delord001
author: Delord001
content: Transportation fare to find daily bread is almost more than  the daily bread now. My people how do we balance this two important things in our life currently now, Looking at your current income now? Is it possible to pick one and drop the other? What do you think!!

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Delord001 on July 20, 2023, 08:42:04 AMTransportation fare to find daily bread is almost more than  the daily bread now. My people how do we balance this two important things in our life currently now, Looking at your current income now? Is it possible to pick one and drop the other? What do you think!!  Oboy This is not a chitchat forum,   you registered yesterday, and your first move is to open topic, what happened to reading and getting acclimated to the forum and seeing how everything works and what kind of topics you should create? As much as we welcome newbies with open arms, we also make every effort to chastise those who violate certain basic principles. You mentioned in your last post that you were introduced by someone here. It's strange how most of you bring someone without providing sufficient directions, and most of these guys end up using AI or plagiarizing in an attempt to gain rank faster and get banned the next day. That being said, OP, this is not the type of topic you ought to create on a forum, and I recommend you lock it. I'm not going to report it since the moderator might nuke you because you only have two activity counts. If you want to voice your displeasure with the current state of the country, there are so many threads for such discussion that you don't have to start your own. Well I welcome you. Here is one of the thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455008.0

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: T.P matas don tie wraps oh. E dey affect wokas stil dey affect companies including oda businesses all togeda.Dis no be only say d TP hi. Na d inflation matas b dat.Som pipo dey til I'd dem go go hustle d next day abi make dem use d T.P at hand hold body cuz dem no even sur if d hustle go pay.Like dis self e don mak som companies don turn dia full tym wokas to part tym jst to mak sur dem d wokas fit gain little 4rm dia pays.And na so plenty mobility owners don go park dia rides bcos dem no fit afford d cost of fuel 4 now.Me, I go define dis time of time as "Hindrance & Restrictions"  cos e dey restrict pipo 4rm goin dia supposed 2 b places and hindering pipo success cuz e gt pipo way dey feed on Tp businesses & numba of passengers 3 patronise dem don reduce.
